Review_Text: Capitalizes on Me Too Movement and absolutely disgusting creep behavior in legal cases that absolutely went no where without ever mentioning the wage theft that went on and was well publicized, just baffles me that there was no mention of this in order to fill out a more complex picture of what went on.There was alot more this could have been if there was other than vague waving at the systemic problems in the hospitality industry, while exposing what happened at two-three restaurants out of his empire. I guess once they got to editing they really didn't have much material to work with. Too much gilding of the lily.
